Instance Property# chunkSize

iOS 11.0+iPadOS 11.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+

```
var chunkSize: Int { get set }
```

## [Discussion](/documentation/corenfc/nfciso15693readmultipleblocksconfiguration/chunksize#discussion)

Number of blocks to read per Read Multiple Blocks command. This may be limited by the tag hardware.
